title: Is it possible to disable 5G on the iPhone 12 and just use LTE? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you don’t change your plan with your carrier, you won’t even have 5G access. If you do change your plan and pay the extra fees, why you would want to turn off the feature is beyond me. The iPhone will only use 5G when it can find it (good luck with that) and even then, it still won’t use it unless it needs to, saving on battery. If you must, you can turn off 5G if you really need to save more battery. Check out this article. How to Change 5G Settings on iPhone 12 to Save Data and Battery

Q: Is it possible to disable 5G on the iPhone 12 and just use LTE? A: Yes Your cell plan is limited to 4G (LTE) unless you pay extra for 5G, so you don't have 5G unless you elected to get itIf by some unusual quirk, your cell phone carrier did upgrade you to 5G, then just as them to downgrade you to 4G (LTE)Done
